identity.name: Honey Royal Vip - Modern Wellness
identity.target_audience: Adult men in Spain seeking natural performance enhancement
identity.design_philosophy: Modern Swiss-style wellness. High whitespace, bold typography, zero clutter. Not 'adult/luxury' style, but 'clinical/natural' style.

usage.cta_primary: bg-[#25D366] hover:bg-[#1DA851] text-white shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

buttons.whatsapp_main: flex items-center justify-center gap-3 px-8 py-4 text-lg font-bold rounded-full bg-[#25D366] text-white hover:bg-[#1DA851] transition-transform hover:scale-105 shadow-xl shadow-green-500/20
buttons.whatsapp_floating: fixed bottom-6 right-6 z-50 flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 rounded-full bg-[#25D366] text-white shadow-2xl hover:scale-110 transition-all duration-300 animate-bounce-subtle

cards.pricing: relative p-8 bg-white border border-zinc-200 rounded-3xl hover:border-amber-400 hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col
cards.pricing_featured: relative p-8 bg-zinc-900 text-white border-zinc-900 rounded-3xl shadow-2xl scale-105 z-10 flex flex-col ring-4 ring-amber-500/20
cards.benefit: p-8 bg-zinc-50 rounded-2xl border border-transparent hover:border-amber-200 transition-colors

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (Zap, ShieldCheck, Clock, Truck, CheckCircle2, MessageCircle)

content_strategy.whatsapp_message: Hola, me gustaría pedir información sobre Honey Royal Vip.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' if not present.
2. FONT: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. HERO: Create a split hero. Left side: 'Potencia Natural, Placer Infinito'. Right side: The 'hero_product' image floating with a subtle drop shadow.
4. BENEFITS: Use a clean grid. Icons should be Amber/Gold color. Text black.
5. PRICING: This is the most important section. Make the '2 Cajas' card pop (scale 1.05, dark background or heavy border). All buttons must open WhatsApp.
6. FAQ: Use Shadcn Accordion. Questions: '¿Cómo se toma?', '¿Cuánto tarda el envío?', '¿Es discreto?'.
8. FLOATING CTA: Add a fixed WhatsApp button on the bottom right for mobile users.
9. ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for 'fade-in-up' effects on scroll. Do not over-animate.
10. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons (e.g., 'whatsapp-hero-btn', 'pricing-pack-1-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, keep it clean white/gray.
Ensure text contrast is high (Zinc-900 for headings).
